website_summaries.verdict: A great choice if your pup needs a comfortable, breathable, and reflective vest for warmer climates or intense exercise.
pros: Lightweight mesh construction has a barely-there feel that most dogs don't mind
Vivid orange color stands out in daylight
Extra wide reflective strips provide excellent visibility at night
Features an adjustable elastic belly strap for extra comfort
Hook-and-loop neck closures are grippy and easy to adjust
cons: Mesh might snag on undergrowth while hunting or hiking

customer_reviews.title: Very staticy and rides back
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Labrador that comes to work with me on the construction site everyday. It fits well and looks like it's good quality. My boy wore it a few times but it always got super staticy and shocked him and me when I pet him. I tried a few static control products but didn't help. It also rides back on him while he walks and when he tries to sit, it tries to slide back up his back but his air gets caught in the holes. I hope that makes sense. It looks quite uncomfortable. I think I should have gotten a solid one instead of the mesh type.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie MTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good high visibility dog vests
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a XXL and a M vest for my 100lbs Newfoundland and 50lbs lab-pointer mix. The vests arrived on time. They fit the dogs perfectly. The vests don't seem to bother the dogs much when we go for walks.The vests also stay in place after going for walks. I've taken the dogs on a dozen or so walks with the vests and only once or twice had to adjust the vest. Overall, I am pleased with the vests and the hunter orange w/ reflector stripes significantly increase the visibility of the dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Retslag1

customer_reviews.title: XXL fits my Great Dane!
customer_reviews.text: XXL fits my 130lb female Great Dane just great! There is a little extra room in the shoulders, the neck hole is plenty big enough, length covers her back, the drop is generous. The belly strap is elastic with a small squeeze release buckle. The front has 2 wide strips of velcro covering the full width of the front. Workmanship seems decent, stitching seems secure. The belly strap is what will be the test. Happy with it and now I feel better about walking my dog in the woods during hunting season.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much better than I hoped
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vest!!! The small fits my 12 pound Snoodle prefect. It is well designed and constructed better than I hoped. The mesh is heavy enough to last, but open enough for it to be worn it the hot summer sun. (Within reason) It is amazing the visible difference between a black dog and a black dog with this vest. I think she likes wearing it. I know she looks good in it, and fast. It's nice to get a well made product for a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C

customer_reviews.title: Great visibility, dries quickly, but tears easily.
customer_reviews.text: I have a hound dog who tends to take off into the woods. This vest makes it much easier to find her. The reflectors are also great for (on leash) night time walks around town. The mesh will be nice and cool in the summer. Update - the mesh tears fairly easily for dogs running through the woods. I just bought a second vest because the first one was so torn up, and the second vest tore the first day my dog wore it. It would be okay for on-leash walks or a more sedentary dog.
customer_reviews.author: Up North

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 kinds of these for my 2 dogs & this is far superior to the other. This one stays on & put & resists tears from brush whereas the other is Velcro only & of a thinner, flimsier variety (the Velcro on the neck of this one is excellent & the part under the belly is a buckle on a stretchy strap) & had a ridiculous amount of rips in it after just the first use. Wish I'd gotten 2 of these instead!
customer_reviews.author: Jannes

customer_reviews.title: advertised sizing is way off!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a medium since it is suppose to be 14" in length. I have several dog blankets that are exactly 14" and fit my dogs length perfectly; however this one is 16 inches in length not 14 inches. It should not be too difficult for the seller to advertise correctly, but this seller is way off. The neck opening would fit a rhino...ridiculous plus I live in Mexico and had to pay extra to get this package and can NOT return it. Ripped off again. done
customer_reviews.author: CasaDeChihuahua

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs wear these vests in the early dark mornings. They are very easily seen, and the reflection is great quality. Place your dog's head through the large hole, and then attach the strap under the belly. Easy on/off. I've had one of the vests for about five YEARS, and while it's not as bright an orange after many washings, the reflective qualities are still strong, so there is no reason to replace it. Lightweight, to be used in order to keep them from getting wet, or keep them warm.
customer_reviews.author: K Ruth

customer_reviews.title: dog that trots in down county road
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY liked this at first-would have given it a 5 stars. Its a breathable mesh material, super bright, easy to put on, easy to wash, good all together-unless your dog runs the woods, through barb wire fences, so and and so on like mine. I'd stitch it back together regularly (and it's identical replacement). THEN I got a traffic-cone-orange 5k shirt I was never ever going to wear. So, he wears it now, with a knot on the back so that he doesn't pee on it.
customer_reviews.author: KT Stone

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, sizing is off, not chew-resistant
customer_reviews.text: After she almost got hit by a reckless driver at a crosswalk, I knew I needed something to protect my dog on nighttime walks. I chose this vest for its bright color and broad reflective strip. I like how easy it is to put on my dog. However, the sizing chart that was up when I first purchased it was a little off, and the vest that I ordered was too big. I had to order the next size down. XL is too large for a dog with a 30 inch girth. Also, my dog is a chewer, and the edging is not that sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Turpie

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this for anyone who walks their dog
customer_reviews.text: This is a must for walking our dog on our country road. I recommend this for anyone who walks their dog, at any time of day. It is very light mesh and our dog does not seem to mind it too much. He is usually anxious about wearing jackets, but he tolerates this one. The sizing chart is perfect. Our dog is a beagle/lab mix and is tough to fit jackets/vests to because he has a narrow waist but a broad chest. This sizing chart was spot-on. I highly recommend this vest for your pups.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Vertin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for running in the woods of Maine
customer_reviews.text: I have a half Basset Hound, half Springer Spaniel he is roughly 55lbs. I went with the medium it fit him snug and not tight. The belly strap is fully extended (his girth is roughly 27") and is a perfect fit for him. No sliding off. The material is stretchy enough so as not to constrict his breathing. My only comment to the manufacture would be to add a d ring either on the back or collar area for an attachment point. He also uses a small cow bell, which would be nice to be able to leave on the vest all the time instead of having to attach it to his regular collar. All in all great product. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: resq2piper

customer_reviews.title: Seemed quality made, BUT not bright, very little coverage & too small
customer_reviews.text: Very small- barely fit my 25 lb. shepherd/fox terrier mix rescue. Did not have much coverage, so it you're looking for that, look elsewhere. It looked okay on our pup, but was too tight and didn't cover nearly as much as it should. The reflector strip seemed okay, but the orange color was not as bright as I was expecting. It seemed as though the quality was good, nicely made. But we were looking for something that had good coverage, bright, easy to see and comfortable for our dogs- this just didn't cut it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dupuis

customer_reviews.title: XXL for very small miniature horses
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product for occasional use. I bought it for my 32” miniature horse (size xxl) to keep him safe during deer season. It’s a little too snug around the girth so I’ll have to return it. However, if it had fit him better, it would have worked well for him to wear on walks and short durations, but I would not recommend it for regular wear during turnout as it would not hold up to that.
customer_reviews.author: js12981

customer_reviews.title: Good, increases day and night visibility
customer_reviews.text: I like it, it does increase the visibility of my mostly black dog. I wish the elastic was a little longer as my dog has a big ol' barrel chest relative to his neck. Reflectivity is nice, but doesn't offer any reflectivity from the front or rear so I'm looking at getting led lights and leash for our evening walks to use in addition to this. The nice thing is the orange can be used on hikes to prevent hunting accidents or increase daytime visibility of my dog.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Adequate vest but a little light.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it primarily to prevent my chocolate lab from being mistaken for a deer. Did put it on her for a brief stint for stocked pheasants in local wildlife management area where there lots of deadfalls from last year's northeasters and she managed to put a small tear in it but otherwise it worked fine after I got it properly adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Philip G. Coates

customer_reviews.title: Visible on the job site
customer_reviews.text: Got a medium, I probably could have sized up a bit for my 50 lbs Kelpie. Can see her much better on the job site and I'm not as worried about my black dog getting run over. Only complaint is the elastic and buckle could be better quality, elastic is thin and buckle is cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Cole A.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I rated 4 of 5 stars because the vest is not shaped correctly if the velcro is positioned so the leash does not stick to it but if the velcro is positioned to best fit the dog, the velcro does not align and it interferes with the function of the leash. XS fits my 7.8 pound Chipoo and 15 pound Rat Terrier and Bichon Frise though it is short on the larger two dogs. Light, flexible mesh allows great air flow and the reflective stripe ensures safety on the street while the bright orange makes a great hunting vest. All around, this is perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: TiGar

customer_reviews.title: Good price. My only complaint is size
customer_reviews.text: The make of this vest is exactly what I was looking for...it is lightweight but not cheap. Good price. My only complaint is size. It doesn't fit my lab well. He is 115 pounds. Not fat but thick, big boned, and broad in the chest. The XXL was too big. The XL fits but slides back. I kept it for when I hike in the woods but he doesn't like to wear it because it chokes him when it slides.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great Visibility!
customer_reviews.text: The visibility of this vest is exceptional. Living out in the woods, it's a great extra safety measure, especially during hunting season. The reflective strips along the sides makes him easier to spot when he's out at night. It is easy to put on, and stays put with the Velcro around the neck and the strap under the belly. I had a question about sizing. Ted is a 100 lb. Yellow Lab, with a thick neck and broad chest. I went for the XL and it fits well. Even if he was a long haired breed, the XL would have worked well for him. I'll be ordering another one as a spare.
customer_reviews.author: JimPSr

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the product is good. However
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the product is good. However, the vest tends to slide up toward the dog's head a bit. I purchased one based on our dog's size/weight, which is probably accurate, but our dog has a long coat, and when the elastic underneath is hooked, the dog looks ridiculous. It looks like the vest is squeezing him with hair sticking out around it. Nonetheless, it does the job, and is highly visible (especially in snow).
customer_reviews.author: justme

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my dark colored dog for hiking trips and mountain biking in nature reserves. It really makes him stand out, and is light and breathable. My dog has no problem running in it, and it hasn't ever fallen off. He's 18" at the withers and 37 lbs, fits great in a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Best vest.
customer_reviews.text: Great reflective dog vest. I was told I wouldn’t have been notice in the sunshine if my dog hadn’t been wearing her vest. The sun was blinding the drivers. Can be worn in hot weather.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Visibility dog vest.
customer_reviews.text: This almost hurt my eyes when I first put it on the dog, so I think it's a great vest for visibility. I live in a hunting area and during the season, orange is a must. I read reviews stating that this vest rips easily when going through the brush and it might, as it is mesh. I put it on the 13# dog when we go walking and don't want to be mistaken for a squirrel, deer, moose, or other wild animal. I bought the small size and it fits her just fine. It would adjust easily if she were a bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: maple leaves

customer_reviews.title: There is no opening to attach a harness, had to improvise and cut one myself.
customer_reviews.text: The extra small was a perfect fit for my 9lb.mix breed dog, she has a dark coat, so with this vest she much more visible when we walk in the early mornings before sunrise! Worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this vest for our 100lb German Shepherd, Samson, so he could be seen when we take him out for a walk in the early morning or evening when it is dark outside. At first he was a little skittish about wearing the vest, but now he gets very excited when we put this vest on him. Samson is now highly visible when we are out with him in the dark. This is a well made product and I would recommend it to anyone with a dog.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kratochwill

customer_reviews.title: Great in looks and fit but not durable:(
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these, one for my small 18 lb terrier and it worked great! High visibility and lasted through hunting season. Comfortable and the dog neveri minded it a bit. My large dog tore his to shreds by catching it on brush about halfway through hunting season. I patched it and it lasted but probably only this season. Great for city dogs or jogging dogs. Not so much for country, outdoor adventure dogs! Rips and catches on things easily:(
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Perez

customer_reviews.title: ) Based on the reviews I ordered the L/G size and I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: Our Lab mix weighs 75 pounds. He's a little chunky :) Based on the reviews I ordered the L/G size and I'm glad I did. The strap is a little snug around his chest at the longest length but it's not too tight. The length ends before his tail. Some of the complaints were that the larger sizes bunch up around the tail. We feel a lot safer during our winter evening walks now!
customer_reviews.author: Sam H

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: So simple, so effective. I bought this for my jack russell chihuahua. There are only two straps, one around the chest and one around the middle. I needed something for him to wear when we went hunting/hiking so someone didn't think he was a rabbit. I also put this on him when we go for walks at night. Highly visible, fits well, well-made, great value for the item. I have to get a couple more in a bigger size for my other dogs.
customer_reviews.author: MCoyne

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price
customer_reviews.text: These dog vests are really nice. Girth measurement was a little vague. My dog's girth at chest is 3 times girth at waist. Contrary to another review, they ARE reflective. My dogs seem eager to get them on. And that's not because they think they are going someplace fun. We take the same walk every morning on our property where they can go on their own all day long. With vests on they become "The caped canine avengers"!
customer_reviews.author: JAC in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Solid product that will last
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 4 years ago and we still use it. Our dog is a 90lb flat coated retriever and the XL fits him fine. Works great for hiking and doesn't get snagged on brush or pick up stickers. Solid product and very reflective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and it's a light mesh so that it doesn't contribute to overheating in dogs with thick/long coats like mine. Definitely worth the
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Aussie perfectly! We use this for bike riding and walking in the woods during hunting season. This is a very well made vest, and it's a light mesh so that it doesn't contribute to overheating in dogs with thick/long coats like mine. Definitely worth the extra few bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Durable connectors! Great Fit!
customer_reviews.text: Nice broad Velcro neck w adjustable elastic buckle strap! Very nice breathable mesh! I will recommend for dog owners!
customer_reviews.author: Arella O. Cecil

customer_reviews.title: Love this product, use daily
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much I bought another for the second dog and returned the cheap crappy one to PetCo. The dogs are both ok putting these on for the late afternoon walks we have to do in the dark during winter. Very reflective for cars also and the organge is very bright making it easy to see the dogs during hunting season, gray days and early dusk here in WI. Very easy to put on the dogs and adjust to fit!
customer_reviews.author: rider

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE! They are breathable, lightweight and easy to put on. My dogs hate them but they are not writing the review. I can easily fold them, they dry fast if wet from rain and they are highly visible. I bought 2.
customer_reviews.author: DogzLife

customer_reviews.title: sizing is tricky
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I didn't make this a 5 star was the sizing -difference between small and medium is incredible -the neck is quite big but the belly elastic is short even with the extra for our terrier mix I ended up returning the med; getting a small and removing the draw clip and attaching the end of the elastic right to the buckle- works great now - the quality of the construction is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl SC

customer_reviews.title: Great for large dog
customer_reviews.text: I walk at night and want to be visiable. I have a large great dane(155 pounds) and this fits him. It doesn't cover his whole back but is big enough to go around his tummy and stays on. Very lightweight but sturdy materials. Would recommend for any night walkers. I am a very careful driver and I still have had some close calls with people and their dogs out at night with no lights or reflectors.
customer_reviews.author: Dirt Diva

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and comfy
customer_reviews.text: This vest was great quality upgrade from our previous vinyl safety vest. Its lightweight and breathable. I like the clip under the belly more than the big velcro on the neck band. We've snagged some holes in the mesh on branches and fences but that is expected when you have a rough and tumble pup. We will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Baker

customer_reviews.title: It really is a high visiblity vest made with care!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two vests for our dogs to wear in the mountains on our remote property. We are pleased with the fit and the quality stitching. The reflective side panels don't interfere with the stretching of the material and maneuverability for our dogs as they romp through the forest. The fit is as described in the product information and we feel very satisfied that there's a good chance the dogs won't be mistaken for wolves or coyotes - during the day or after dark. Thank you making a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Polina L.

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely high viz, but it's not really durable enough for the field if your dog spends any time at all in the briers. I will say that it dries quickly and it's so light weight that the dogs don't seem to overheat from wearing it like they do when I've used other heavy duty gear. Might be just right for hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce K. Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect vest. Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect vest and perfect fit for our daughters 95lb Bernese Mountain Dog. It is a lightweight mesh fabric so the dog does not get overheated while running and playing. She plays near the woods. This vest can be seen clearly from a distance and will help keep her safe from hunters. It also makes it easy to keep track of her.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Good quality dog vest for maximum visibility. If your like me and either walk your dogs (I have two labs) on the road or in the woods, this vest will make them stand out. The reflective sides are great, the Velcro closure is easy, the chest strap is easy to apply. JUST BE SURE TO GET THE RIGHT SIZE. I ordered two Large for my 60 pound labs and could have easily gotten by with a medium. But all in all a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Boulet

customer_reviews.title: A Must for Early Morning Walks
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product, great visibility. Make sure you order the correct size a I believe they run a little small. We have a 130 lb Bernese Mountain Dog (x-large for sure); however our 40 lb lab mix required a large where I thought s medium would fit.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Baich

customer_reviews.title: This vest fit great and we have had no issues with it
customer_reviews.text: My dad rides horses and takes his BROWN dog with him. He's often riding through the woods aND the dog, being a dog, gets curious and wanders off. We ordered this vest to help raise visibility in case of hunters or just to give dad a clearer sight to him. This vest fit great and we have had no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Avalir

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, I have an elderly small black poodle, she is very slow and a hard for my elderly Mother to see at night. We put this vest on the dog in the evening and my Mom can now see where the dog is and no one gets hurt! The vest is light weight and very comfortable for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: J. Goldwater

customer_reviews.title: We love our shiny orange dog!
customer_reviews.text: We walk our dog on dark country roads. He is a black lab so I was always afraid that people would not see us. We almost got hit one night so hubby and I got reflective vests. Then one night the dog got off the leash and headed for the country road! I was so frightened he'd get hit! Now I know that people will see him in his bright fluorescent orange vest with the reflective strips. Easy on, easy off, and he looks so handsome in his shiny new vest!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Smiles ;-)

customer_reviews.title: Everyone Sees our pet!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We live in upper lower Michigan, and lots of hunting. Our fur baby is like the color of a white tail deer, so we needed to have her visible during the hunting season just for safety and protection. This is awesome. Can see it from a distance and at night the reflection is highly visible. Makes us feel awesome that she is seen.
customer_reviews.author: B. Heist

customer_reviews.title: boughtit for hunting season
customer_reviews.text: I have newfoundland dog ...bout 150 pounds.. just wanted to keep her safe during hunting season... love the way I don't have to put her legs through some holes... that's a hard thing to do when your dog don't wanna cooperate. the quick slip around belt made that easy as well as just slipping it over her head.. she does not even mind it... I think she likes it even. and it's not made cheap ... should last us quite a few years
customer_reviews.author: Gary Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for walking in urban areas where I wanted my ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for walking in urban areas where I wanted my dog to be more visible at night. It's nice & light mesh so good in summertime and unobtrusive for sensitive dogs. It is not hardy enough for dogs crashing through bushes, so I would not buy this for hiking in the woods during hunting season unless you keep your dog on the trail.
customer_reviews.author: Bicyclistetcetera

customer_reviews.title: Really Like These!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these "Don't Shoot Me, I'm not a DEER!" vests for each of my boys. They are really good. The mesh material is great, the vests are durable. The dogs don't mind wearing them for long periods and they make the dogs visible in almost any lighting or weather conditions. The only thing that keeps them from being 5 Stars is that the chest closure needs a little reinforcing behind the hook and loop to keep it from bunching up on active dogs.
customer_reviews.author: foodgeek

customer_reviews.title: so I bought another because I liked it that much
customer_reviews.text: The stomach strap on the first one I got lots its elasticity after a while, so I bought another because I liked it that much. It's got a really big reflective patch and is otherwise strong.
customer_reviews.author: waimanu

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this vest! We hike almost everyday and there is hunting in the area so we dress bright! It is light and doesn’t bother her at all!
customer_reviews.author: Ebi Martin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Adjustable belt make for a perfect fit. It really reflects brightly in the night when you shine a light on it. Plus I use it during the day too because my dog is black and the orange color is really bright, and I can keep my eye on her easily.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Muller

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, velcro is a fur magnet.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a couple of these. Sizing: 100lb Dog: Large (Good fit) 60lb Dog: Large (Could probably fit an XL) -1 star because I wished it used a button/clasp in front instead of velcro... the velcro retains a lot of fur.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: They run a little on the plus side. So if in doubt order a size smaller. Ordered a med and small. Had to return a med for an x-small. The sm fit the one I ordered the med. First time I ever had to exchange an item on Amazon and it was effortless. Really like these and they fit so well. Just received the x-sm in no time after asking to exchange. Both dogs look stylish and the price was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: RTB

customer_reviews.title: I bought the large for by 75 pound lab shepard ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the large for by 75 pound lab shepard mix. Going off the measurement scale I was suppose to order and XL - the large fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. I use it almost daily when i run my 100 lb doberman through the woods . It fits perfect , XL, and has held up really well. Ive bought this twice and the only reason i had to buy a second one is that after a year the first one got pretty stinky from getting wet all the time .
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T.

customer_reviews.title: Love this vest!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I feel so much more secure with taking my dog out to run, especially during hunting season. Now she can be seen, both in daylight and in the dark. I'm thinking she should wear this vest whether it's hunting season or not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The vest was true to size and adjustable to fit ...
customer_reviews.text: The vest was true to size and adjustable to fit. The vest is mesh so my dog doesn't over heat while running. It will also tear/rip if they get caught on something. That is a major safety feature for me. Orders two more vests to keep on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The medium fits my 70lb female Lab just fine. It won't for obvious reasons, fit my 100lb male Lab. The large doesn't ride well on him either, though, but it's still better than a black dog on the road at night with no markings at all. Light weight, it is perforated for ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Canine Friendly Orange Dog Vest, Large
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful - very soft, flexible, with soft elastic. Fits like a dream and very adjustable. My dog, a standard poodle, hates all vests, except this one. He is a service dog so it is a problem. I sure wish they made this in different colors. This one is really only good for hunting season.
customer_reviews.author: Hard to please reader in the Upper Peninsula of Michigan

customer_reviews.title: seems pretty durable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: really liking this product.. seems pretty durable and lightweight, yet highly visible and reflective. The one point of improvement they could make would be to lengthen the velcro on the front to allow more adjustability. Otherwise, great product thus far.
customer_reviews.author: handydan

customer_reviews.title: This cape is fantastic. I used to get hassled by all the ...
customer_reviews.text: This cape is fantastic. I used to get hassled by all the neighborhood supervillans about my crap-crud super suit. Now I got this sweetness wrapped around me 24-7. Pros: The Clasp is a little wide, but it keeps my neck warm at high altitudes, and the anti billow strap isn't usually my style , but it's nice for those that use it. Cons: I really wish they made larger sizes, like a full superman-size. This thing's barely a shazaam.
customer_reviews.author: Stuff and/or things

customer_reviews.title: Would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Love the design, light weight, good look, however Velcro is showing wear. 4 stars as I would buy it again. Haven't found a better vest.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: The vest is very easy to adjust and fit but it did not hold ...
customer_reviews.text: The vest is very easy to adjust and fit but it did not hold up well in the woods for my more active puppy. I am on my second vest with him in 2 weeks and ended up just duct taping the holes as he goes. The less active dogs vest is still in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: Alesia

customer_reviews.title: Keeping your dog safe
customer_reviews.text: Great visibility for our one year old black Labradoodle puppy! After having a few cars not see us on our nightly walks and almost running into us, I figured I needed to find a product to keep our dog safe. This is great! Excellent visibility and light weight. Easy to put on with the velcro attachment at the neck and the strap around the dog's belly. Follow the suggested measuring instructions for sizing. Our dog is about 55 lbs, has a good size neck and the large fits just right. Order was delivered before promised and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Gall

customer_reviews.title: Not very reflective
customer_reviews.text: Not very reflective. The gray band looks like it would be all reflective material, but it is just gray cloth. The only reflective part is two 1/8" strips of piping at the edges of the gray. You can't see this from very far off.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Danner

customer_reviews.title: High Visibility!
customer_reviews.text: I love this dog vest. It is easy to put on and take off and fits perfectly without being restrictive. Well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki M Thomas

customer_reviews.title: great for my hunting dog.
customer_reviews.text: My hound dog tends to get carried away when we exercise him int the woods. He'll take off after a deer or something and we panic that we've lost him forever... No more! Now we can spot him at a distance, thanks to the flash of orange. This is nice and light so he can wear it in the summer months, too.
customer_reviews.author: corcovado

customer_reviews.title: ... elastic strap under the belly helps to get a perfect fit around to keep it in place
customer_reviews.text: The adjustable elastic strap under the belly helps to get a perfect fit around to keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Sloane

customer_reviews.title: Not for field work
customer_reviews.text: I returned this because I knew it would catch snags very easily. I would be fine if the dog will be staying only in clear areas such as a lawn, driveway, sidewalks, etc. Definitely not for field work.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made but not tough enough for an active dog
customer_reviews.text: The mesh is too easily torn and has already started falling apart after only a little use. Just running through the bushes and it had several large tears. I love the design and it fits my dogs well and allows him to move freely but to be used on an active dog it needs to be made of tougher material. i would highly recommend this for someone who does not let their dog off leash but needs high visibility for safe walks.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pagan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this vest for my dog. Adjustable strap allows it to stay on securely without being too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Sadler

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great for hiking with an adventurous dog! The strap in the front is wider than many other harnesses/vest, and the Velcro in that area makes it a little stiff, so if you have a gear sensitive dog it may take a little getting used to for them. In my opinion, the visibility of the wider front strap is a much bigger Pro than Con. It's extremely breathable and dries easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Moran

customer_reviews.title: Stays put!
customer_reviews.text: They have served they're purpose, and so far so good! They stayed on my pups for our hikes without falling off. Make sure to measure your pups, I didn't. The large was a little too big on my 45 lb Sheagle (Shepherd/Beagle mix lol) but it still managed to stay on regardless. A great buy
customer_reviews.author: Meep Meep

customer_reviews.title: Terrific visibility
customer_reviews.text: My husband takes a predawn run with our dog every day. This vest is comfortable for the dog and the reflective surface lies flat and is highly visible. The vest can shift side to side as there is no loop on top for his leash to fit through.
customer_reviews.author: S. Woodyard

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: Size may run a little big - got the medium based on the girth measurement for my 22# beagle. Vest is a bit long, but not enough to cause any problems. The chest strap where it secures under the neck is a bit wide, which puts the edge of the vest low across the dog's shoulders, but again, no problem. Do note the silver colored "swoosh" shape on each side is NOT reflective, only the piping that borders it is, but it still provides good visibility.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Taylor

customer_reviews.title: My dog is solid black and impossible to see against ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog is solid black and impossible to see against the dark road and grass. This keeps her visible when she goes out to do her business. It has already saver her butt more than once from the speeders in my neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Scott McCloud

customer_reviews.title: my dog is an English bull terrier(broad through the chest ...
customer_reviews.text: my dog is an English bull terrier(broad through the chest.this vest ran small on her. otherwise the fit was o.k. I gave the vest to a friend with much smallernarrow chested dog.. everything turned out alright.
customer_reviews.author: ROSALIE JONAS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and Service
customer_reviews.text: Product looks exactly as it appears in ad. Shipping quickly and packaged with care of the product in mind. All around excellent product. This is just perfect for what I wanted. High Visibility!! The clasp is very secure! Comfortable on my Large 89 lb chocolate lab! It is mesh, which really is nice on these hot days. He needs lots of exercise and when the wheelchair is outside in full speed mode it is light and allows for air to flow through while he is running. It looks brand new and he rolls in the grass or shakes and wears it daily. I'm so pleased and would expect you would be very happy too.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: Great, high quality product! I have a medium/large Pit Bull and this vest fits him like a glove. Nobody's gonna mistake him for a deer this season! I'd happily recommend this vest to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: DerCribben

customer_reviews.title: Love this vest!
customer_reviews.text: This vest is just perfect for our border collie/australian shepherd mix. We live on a farm where she can run freely. Her brown coloring makes her hard to see. This vest works well as we can spot her easily and it is lightweight with air holes throughout so she does not get too warm. It also has nice reflector strips up the sides if needed. I measured her girth and bought the medium. Fits perfectly. I would highly recommend this vest.
customer_reviews.author: ADRIENNE C.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for my 70 # dog
customer_reviews.text: Truely highly visible, lightweight. We will find out if it is light enough to wear in the Texas heat, it appears to be. Good fit for my 70 # dog. very easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Taosgator

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit!
customer_reviews.text: This safety vest fits my dog Gypsy perfect and it allows her to be on construction job sites!
customer_reviews.author: Amy in Turlock, CA

customer_reviews.title: and I get the XL vests because I like the coverage
customer_reviews.text: I have two lab mixes, each about 90ish pounds, and I get the XL vests because I like the coverage. They are a light color, so the orange helps me see them when they are roaming through the high grass. The price is right, so when the vests need replacing, it doesn't hurt your budget.
customer_reviews.author: CJThompson

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. Bought as a gift for the neighbours large Bermese Mountain Dog, it just fits with a few retrofits from the owner. He can be seen in the bush now and no longer looks like a young moose!!
customer_reviews.author: superauntie

customer_reviews.title: Hunting Vest
customer_reviews.text: My 75 lb. lab/husky does really well wearing this especially during hunting season. The orange fabric is perforated so it can snag on trees and bushes; it doesn't rip easily, but it can. Fits my dog well and keeps her visible. Solid buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nickname

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our black lab...
customer_reviews.text: This works great for my black lab at night. She is about 85lbs and the XL is perfect for her and smaller would not have worked. We are very happy our little girl is protected!
customer_reviews.author: Canon23

customer_reviews.title: You can't miss Fido if he's got this vest on
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, breathes, and is lightweight. My German Shepherd is highly visible in the woods while wearing this vest, vastly decreasing my concerns that he might be mistaken for a forest critter during hunting season. My only critique is that it causes a lot of static in the fur, but it doesn't seem to cause him any discomfort and dissipates quickly once removed. I would recommend it to anybody who needs their dog to be seen (for whatever reason that may be).
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product.....very light weight, great reflection, and extremely well made. My dog is 12 pounds a five year old Llasapoo, the small fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: K P

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these vests for my German Shepherds. Now we can hike in the beautiful Wind River Range without a fear of being shot by hunters. The vests are bright and do not restrict my dogs' movements. I am very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vest
customer_reviews.text: This is my second vest My dog wears it every time we go hiking. The vest is lightweight so it does not cause him to overheat in summer. Also most people we meet on the trail are less afraid of a dog wearing a vest. The vest offers high visibility so I can see him when he runs off the trail.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great Size For Alaskan Malamutes!
customer_reviews.text: We Camp A Lot And Have An Alaskan Malamute. This Dog Vest Features Plenty Of Room For Big Dogs And Is Easily Seen At Night By Others/Motorists When We Take Him For Long Walks. The Mesh Is Great For Staying Cool With Long Haired Dogs!
customer_reviews.author: JSaulsgiver

customer_reviews.title: Good product for late night dog walks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this, along with a vest for myself, so that I may take my golden retriever out for her evening walks after work. She doesn't mind wearing it and she stands out so all the crazy car drivers can see her. Good decision
customer_reviews.author: John Q. Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A black dog being walked on a black night is now visible to drivers.
customer_reviews.author: Scmichael

customer_reviews.title: light vest
customer_reviews.text: this would be good for a dog that does not run threw the woods it tears easy but for dog onwers that just walk there dog around town or play in a park this is a good vest dog is highly visable with it on
customer_reviews.author: Jason N.

customer_reviews.title: Safety vest for pooch.
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my dog when I get home from work in the evenings so he's visible to the cars. Never viewed it on him from a distance, so can't tell if it really reflects well or not. I do like the bright color.
customer_reviews.author: NurseSmartyPants

customer_reviews.title: excellent for summer
customer_reviews.text: this vest is very lightweight and is perfect for summer weather. It fits well, is very bright and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Stilley

customer_reviews.title: Have since bought their harnesses too and pleased w all of them
customer_reviews.text: This brand fits both my Jack Russell's perfectly and they are hard to size. Quality made. Have since bought their harnesses too and pleased w all of them .
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Love it but I'm worried about the fabric
customer_reviews.text: The vest fits well on my Dobbie and I think as soon as he fully grows up it'll fit even better. My only issue is that it's made out of a mesh-like fabric and seems to be pretty easy to be destroyed so i have to take it off him or his doggie pals playing will rip it
customer_reviews.author: GGMBA

product_meta.title: Canine Friendly High Visibility Dog Vest
product_meta.description: Size:LargeProvide your dog with extreme visibility, both day and night. Comfortable, bright neon orange mesh construction along with reflective piping. To view all of our products please visit our amazon store at www.amazon.com/Canine-Friendly/
feature_bullets: Make sure your canine companion is seen both day and night
Bright orange mesh vest is visible during the day, while the reflective piping offers high visibility at night
Made from lightweight fabric and adjustable elastic belly strap to provide maximum comfort, velcro closures around the neck for optimal fit
Size large fits a girth of 26 to 35 inches and length of 20 inches

Canine Friendly stands behind the legendary quality and craftsmanship of their products. That’s why they are committed to offer a repair or replace guarantee on all their products - broken or damaged - for the life of your pet. Please find guarantee information on RC Pet Products website for all purchases after 30 days.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
